Text: FW Salmon Fishingis one my alltime favorite funnies Turn your sound up Mark salmonasf

RE College Savings Plan of Nebraskahtmjust got some more information in the mail yesterday on the College Savings Plan We will study it some more and let you know how good or bad it sounds Some good may be that YOU could deduct the amount you give on YOUR income tax there doesnt seem to be a cap on deducting the amount you give if you make big bucks The initial bad I see is the year fee plus of earnings Anyway we will look it over in more detail They do not restrict you to only go to Nebraska colleges and you do not have to be a Nebraska resident to open up an account Josh and Jarrod could each have an account with annual contributions up to tax deferred and when you take the money out it is taxed at Josh and Jarrods tax rate Please remind mereassure me about the Educational IRA It is similar to a Roth IRA in that taxes are paid by you in this caseon the money prior to putting it into the account I dont list it anywhere on my income tax forms until we start taking the money out In essence it is as if we are putting of our own money taxes already paid into the account right There is no school again today Ice on the roads and more ice and snow to come later today I think this is the th or th day they have missed They have to make it up at the end of the school year Mom said your house on the lake is all done being remodeled Bet it looks nice Have a great day Love Linda Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday February PM To Subject FW College Savings Plan of Nebraskahtm Linda and Mark I would like you guys to decide what to do and let me know Ben and Anna will more than likely go to Nebraska so it make sense We still have to make the contribution so if you want me to send it to the Nebraska fund let me know Love Jim Forwarded by Jim SchwiegerHOUECT on PM Mark or Linda Woita on PM Please respond to To Jim Schwieger Email cc Subject FW College Savings Plan of Nebraskahtm Jim This was just passed by the Nebraska legislature and thought it might be a better plan than the educational IRA Let us know what you think Love and Hugs Linda PS I worked on the Ameritrade stuff Schedule D some more Hopefully I plugged in the right s I might mail a copy to you just to be sure Too bad we dont have a scanner here at home College Savings Plan of Nebraskahtm See attached file College Savings Plan of Nebraskahtm

RE ThanksBack Mom said you werent feeling so great all week because of your sinus problems and a sore throat NO FUN Hope youre better now If you are at work today you are probably swamped with things to catch up on You make it pretty hard to give you a thankyou I write you an email thanking you for great stuff youve done and you come back with more stuff to give us Coming to Houston for the th of July sounds good to us WE APPRECIATE THE OFFER TO PAY FOR AIRFARE We had been thinking of renting a van to drive the whole way The tricky thing again this year is figuring out how to get Ben there He has another church event the week of June thJuly nd We thought about having him ride back on the bus to Omaha so he doesnt miss out on the fun stuff they do on the way back arriving Monday the nd around noon and then we all fly out together on the afternoon of the nd or Mark Anna and I leave on Friday or Saturday the th or th and have Marlyss and Gary help Ben catch a flight Monday the nd or Tuesday the rd Mark should be able to take the whole week off The other tricky thing in the whole deal has to do with whether Ben will have to take summer school He has been told that if he flunks a class this semester he will have to retake it in summer school We wont know for sure if he is going to flunk until the middle or end of May If he has to take summer school he will not go on the church event or come to Houston with us because summer school is only offered the first part of June through July th If reservations are made for Ben we would not be able to use it Let me know your thoughts I did look up information again about the educational IRA According to page of the instruction book you cannot deduct contributions to an educational IRA just like you cannot deduct contributions to a Roth Mark and I havent decided anything about the NE fund You probably realize this but the kids educational IRAs are not doing well Your contribution is now down to I know you say for the long run we shouldnt worry but since Ben will graduate in years Im wondering if it is still the best place to be Let me know what you think Love and Hugs Linda Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March PM To Subject Thanks Linda Thanks for the note have you guys decided about the Nebr Fund Your one previous e mail about the Education IRA bothers me Im not sure if I replied to you or not but you and Mark should be deducting the for Ben for Anna on your tax return Im not positive about the deduction but there is something you need to fill out Im sure I can not make the contribution myself because my income is over the limit allowed That is why I deposit cash so it looks like you and Mark have done it If you get a chance look into this for me for your taxes Dont worry about Like I told Mom money is not something the Schieger Family should have to worry about for a long time The FORCE has been good You just need to communicate with me The boys and I are leaving for Colorado to go skiing this Friday We will be there until Saturday March Brent Chad Daniel are going with us so Josh Jarrod will have company and I can relax I would like you Mark to start thinking about the fourth of July this year I thought it would be nice to give Donna a break and have everyone down here this July I realize the fourth is on a Wednesday which might take some maneuvering for Mark One idea is to take the whole week off as vacation and you guys could stay at the lake house the whole week It would be like Minnesota just alot warmer There would be a ski boat two wave runners fishing etc If you are interested let me know as soon as possible I will pay for the airfare for the four of you so the sooner you decide the more time the travel agent has to find good deals Ya quite bitching about me paying for the airfare Get over it Love Ya Swig Forwarded by Jim SchwiegerHOUECT on PM Mark or Linda Woita on PM Please respond to To Jim Schwieger Email cc Subject Thanks Just wanted to say thanks for all you do for us I think about it a lot I just dont tell you enough I really appreciate our van knowing we paid so little for it I am very thankful for our windows siding and roof and knowing what a deal you have given us makes it even better It is comforting to know we will have some money for the kids education Etc Etc Etc Love and Hugs Linda
Fw on the lighter side Original Message From Mark Woita Mark HLBTopekacom Sent Friday October PM Subject on the lighter side

Wave Runner licenseHello Good news Ben passed all of his classesby the skin of his teeth so he is able to come to Houston Ben and I both tried to find the web site about the wave runner license but were unsuccessful Were you able to ask your friends Ben is now very anxious to take the test so he can drive one of the wave runners Love Linda

RE Wave Runner licenseSo who is the year old fat guy that found it for you Your not fat and you aint YET Love Linda PS Ben took the test and past it He is having the temporary license faxed to Marks office Original Message From Schwieger Jim mailto Sent Thursday June PM To Subject FW Wave Runner license Hi guys I want you both to know that you should be totally embarrassed that the year old fat guy found the web site on his own when you two could not The web site is wwwboatedcomtx Ben get on it right away so that you can ride the wave runners by yourself Its going to be fun Congratulations on passing all of your classes See you in a couple of weeks Swig Original Message From Mark or Linda Woita ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMarkorLindaWoitaCmwoitahome EcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday June PM To Schwieger Jim Subject Wave Runner license Hello Good news Ben passed all of his classesby the skin of his teeth so he is able to come to Houston Ben and I both tried to find the web site about the wave runner license but were unsuccessful Were you able to ask your friends Ben is now very anxious to take the test so he can drive one of the wave runners Love Linda winmaildat
FW Salmon Fishingis one my alltime favorite funnies Turn your sound up Mark salmonasf

CarsHi Jim We have narrowed our choice of vehicles to two minivans a Toyota Sienna and a Chrysler Town Country Surprisingly Ben helped us eliminate SUVs from consideration He prefers the smoother ride of the minivan It will be better for taking long trips The down side is he doesnt want to be seen driving a minivan once he turns Ha We were able to help satisfy Anna and Ben by choosing a higherend minivan that has many bells and whistles on it yet still costs less than an SUV We are leaning toward the Toyota even though it is a bit smaller than the Chrysler because of its reliability and how it holds its resale value The Toyota dealer also has over invoice sale on currently Plus they told Mark there will be additional financing incentives starting this Saturday Both the Toyota and Chrysler dealers have vehicles in inventory we can choose from So we hope to close the deal with the Toyota dealer this coming Saturday What do you think Love Linda PS We got a pkg in the mail today from you Thanks I will wait until the kids are here to open it

Plane flightGood Morning Hope your teeth arent too sore today Mark and I talked about when to come to Houston The ideal would be for the of us Mark Linda Anna to fly down late morning on Sat the th Ben would need a late afternoon flight on Monday July ndhe is suppose to pull in from the bus at noon so late afternoon would give him some buffer time All of us could fly back on Sunday July th late morning or what ever is available We are flexible Thanks a bunch We are looking forward to a great visit Love and Hugs Linda

RE ThanksPlease respond to Welcome Back Mom said you werent feeling so great all week because of your sinus problems and a sore throat NO FUN Hope youre better now If you are at work today you are probably swamped with things to catch up on You make it pretty hard to give you a thankyou I write you an email thanking you for great stuff youve done and you come back with more stuff to give us Coming to Houston for the th of July sounds good to us WE APPRECIATE THE OFFER TO PAY FOR AIRFARE We had been thinking of renting a van to drive the whole way The tricky thing again this year is figuring out how to get Ben there He has another church event the week of June thJuly nd We thought about having him ride back on the bus to Omaha so he doesnt miss out on the fun stuff they do on the way back arriving Monday the nd around noon and then we all fly out together on the afternoon of the nd or Mark Anna and I leave on Friday or Saturday the th or th and have Marlyss and Gary help Ben catch a flight Monday the nd or Tuesday the rd Mark should be able to take the whole week off The other tricky thing in the whole deal has to do with whether Ben will have to take summer school He has been told that if he flunks a class this semester he will have to retake it in summer school We wont know for sure if he is going to flunk until the middle or end of May If he has to take summer school he will not go on the church event or come to Houston with us because summer school is only offered the first part of June through July th If reservations are made for Ben we would not be able to use it Let me know your thoughts I did look up information again about the educational IRA According to page of the instruction book you cannot deduct contributions to an educational IRA just like you cannot deduct contributions to a Roth Mark and I havent decided anything about the NE fund You probably realize this but the kids educational IRAs are not doing well Your contribution is now down to I know you say for the long run we shouldnt worry but since Ben will graduate in years Im wondering if it is still the best place to be Let me know what you think Love and Hugs Linda Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March PM To Subject Thanks Linda Thanks for the note have you guys decided about the Nebr Fund Your one previous e mail about the Education IRA bothers me Im not sure if I replied to you or not but you and Mark should be deducting the for Ben for Anna on your tax return Im not positive about the deduction but there is something you need to fill out Im sure I can not make the contribution myself because my income is over the limit allowed That is why I deposit cash so it looks like you and Mark have done it If you get a chance look into this for me for your taxes Dont worry about Like I told Mom money is not something the Schieger Family should have to worry about for a long time The FORCE has been good You just need to communicate with me The boys and I are leaving for Colorado to go skiing this Friday We will be there until Saturday March Brent Chad Daniel are going with us so Josh Jarrod will have company and I can relax I would like you Mark to start thinking about the fourth of July this year I thought it would be nice to give Donna a break and have everyone down here this July I realize the fourth is on a Wednesday which might take some maneuvering for Mark One idea is to take the whole week off as vacation and you guys could stay at the lake house the whole week It would be like Minnesota just alot warmer There would be a ski boat two wave runners fishing etc If you are interested let me know as soon as possible I will pay for the airfare for the four of you so the sooner you decide the more time the travel agent has to find good deals Ya quite bitching about me paying for the airfare Get over it Love Ya Swig Forwarded by Jim SchwiegerHOUECT on PM Mark or Linda Woita on PM Please respond to To Jim Schwieger Email cc Subject Thanks Just wanted to say thanks for all you do for us I think about it a lot I just dont tell you enough I really appreciate our van knowing we paid so little for it I am very thankful for our windows siding and roof and knowing what a deal you have given us makes it even better It is comforting to know we will have some money for the kids education Etc Etc Etc Love and Hugs Linda
